relation: Oh Celestia have mercy! / Sweet merciful Celestia! / Celestia's mercy!
Oh, Celestia damn them to hell!
Oh fuck me with Celestia’s forehooves!
Luna rape you with her horn!
Sit on my horn and spin
Luna fuck me with the moon.
Stick a horn where Celestia don’t shine!
Oh fuck me with the moon. Moon, sun, both of them. Rape me hard.
Oh for the love of Luna.
Celestia and Luna damn them both to the burning...
Celestia clop my clit with a hoof-full of sunfire!
Luna rape them with Her horn!
Luna clop me with Her wings.
Oh Goddesses fuck me in a three-way, ...
The stars curse me to a thousand rapes by the horn on Nightmare Moon.
Luna-eclipsing orgasms! The Goddess-damned Hellhounds were taking out the fucking foundation!

Oh no. No. Celestia rape me with a solar flare, no.

By the ballsacks of a thousand star-devils.

Luna shove my cunt full of moonrocks and call me home.
